title: 【献爱心】有谁知道RLcraft里面紫色的火焰怪物是什么mod里的吗
author: 青芦叶
txt_content:
本帖最后由 青芦叶 于 2020-4-12 00:59 编辑 





image.png (56.68 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-11 23:53 上传





翻译过来好像叫做【疾病xx】的怪物。




file_1586620532000.jpg (31.8 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-11 23:55 上传








如果有模组wiki的详细介绍页面链接，必定献上人气感谢。

附：RLcraft
[1.12.2]RLcraft ☆ 超现实 x 虚拟生存，这不是幸福的生存，而是来自恐惧的…
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-927630-1-1.html



为了方便后来人，给出详细答案:
[1.15.2-1.9.4][Scaling Health——生命扩展]高版本启示录？生命、伤害等高自由度配置
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1010749-1-1.html
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/scaling-health

官网关于紫火的介绍：
BlightsBlights are extremely powerful mobs. These are ordinary mobs (even from other mods) that have spawned with far more health, higher damage-dealing potential, and a variety of potion effects including a large speed boost. They also tend to spawn with armor. Blights have a purple fire effect at all times which makes them easy to identify, even if submerged in water.By default, blights drop more heart containers than standard mobs (0-2 each by default, instead of a small chance of getting one) and ten times the XP. Blights have a variety of config options available, and can even be disabled entirely if that's what you want.
虽然不知道有没有用，希望能让更多人搜到：tag:RLcraft  紫火  疾病僵尸 紫火僵尸 紫火怪 疾病怪

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
站在旁边，输入 /say @e[r=5]

然后按下 t ，鼠标移到“疾病僵尸”删，再截图让我看一下
